text: Well, I was at work one day I was doing my usual job working on the warehouse floor stocking boxes organizing merchandise
keypoint: I was doing my usual warehouse job, stocking and organizing

text: I had been working for a few hours it was getting late
keypoint: I had been working for hours and it was getting late

text: I had been feeling a bit strange a bit lightheaded but chalked it up to hunger not having eaten yet that day
keypoint: I felt lightheaded and blamed it on not eating

text: But then, as I was walking around the warehouse returning items to their proper places
keypoint: As I walked around returning items, things changed

text: I started to feel a strange tightness and pressure in my chest
keypoint: I felt tightness and pressure in my chest

text: I stopped what I was doing leaned against a nearby wall for a bit
keypoint: I stopped and leaned against the wall

text: the pressure only got stronger I could feel my heart pounding in my chest
keypoint: The pressure increased and my heart pounded

text: Next thing I know, I started seeing spots I could feel sweat dripping down my forehead my arms
keypoint: I saw spots and sweat dripped down my face and arms

text: I tried to take some deep breaths I just couldn't catch my breath
keypoint: I tried to breathe but couldn’t catch my breath

text: I was really scared didn't know what to do.
keypoint: I was scared and didn’t know what to do

text: Suddenly I heard a voice coming from across the warehouse. It was the manager who had seen me called out to me
keypoint: The manager saw me and called out from across the warehouse

text: it seems someone had noticed me was checking to see if I was alright
keypoint: Someone noticed and checked if I was alright

text: I tried to yell back that something was wrong I couldn't find my voice.
keypoint: I tried to yell for help but couldn’t speak

text: The manager started walking towards me I could feel my world going dark I started to drop to the ground
keypoint: The manager walked over as I started to collapse

text: luckily the manager got to me in time caught me just before my legs gave out
keypoint: The manager caught me just before I fell

text: He took me to the staff room sat me down in a chair
keypoint: He took me to the staff room and sat me down

text: He asked me questions about what was wrong what happened
keypoint: He asked me what was wrong and what happened

text: He got me a glass of cold water told me to rest for a bit
keypoint: He gave me water and told me to rest

text: After a few minutes the pressure in my chest slowly eased up I started to feel better
keypoint: After a few minutes, the pressure eased and I felt better

text: It turned out I had been having a panic attack
keypoint: I realized I had a panic attack

text: I escaped from the situation the help of the quick action of the manager
keypoint: I escaped the situation thanks to the manager’s quick help

text: It was never a fun experience it really could have been much worse
keypoint: It was a terrible experience but could have been worse

text: it taught me to check in with myself make sure to properly rest eat to avoid further episodes
keypoint: I learned to check in, rest, and eat to avoid this again
